Lesson 9: Applied Image Analysis for the Urban Environment

In this lesson, you will learn how to applied image analysis for urban planning and management.
Published

August 19, 2022

Content

  • Urban Land-use/Land Cover Change Detection: Principles and Methods
  • Urban Features Extraction techniques

Lesson Slides and Hands-on Notes

  • Lesson slides in html and pdf formats.

  • Hands-on Exercise 10 in html and pdf formats.

References

Articles

  • Sandipta Das . Dasharatha P Angadi (2022) “Land use land cover change detection and monitoring of urban growth using remote sensing and GIS techniques: a micro-level study” GeoJournal, Vol. 87, pp. 2101–2123.

  • Geymen, Abdurrahman ; Baz, Ibrahim (2007) Monitoring urban growth and detecting land-cover changes on the Istanbul metropolitan area, Environmental Monitoring and Assessment, Vol.136 (1-3), p.449-459.

  • Yin, Jie et. al. (2010) Monitoring urban expansion and land use/land cover changes of Shanghai metropolitan area during the transitional economy (1979–2009) in China, Environmental Monitoring and Assessment, Vol.177 (1-4), p.609-621.

  • Praveen Kumar Mallupattu* and Jayarama Reddy Sreenivasula Reddy (2013) Analysis of Land Use/Land Cover Changes Using Remote Sensing Data and GIS at an Urban Area, Tirupati, India, The Scientific World Journal (online)

QGIS Methods

  • Landcover change detection using QGIS. Land use landcover change detection

  • Step-by-Step: Land Cover Change Detection through Supervised Classification.

QGIS Plugin

  • GEOSYS Plugin
  • PCA4CD - PCA for change detection
  • buildseg: QGIS plugin for building extraction
  • Semi-Automatic Classification Plugin (SCP) for QGIS
  • Terminus
  • Tree Density Calculator
  • Urban Green SARCA
